props.name: items
props.description: the list of items that have to be displayed in agenda. If you want to render item as empty date the value of date key has to be an empty array []. If there exists no value for date key it is considered that the date in question is not yet loaded

props.name: loadItemsForMonth
props.description: Handler which gets executed when items for a certain month should be loaded (month became visible)

props.name: onDayChange
props.description: Handler which gets executed when day changes while scrolling agenda list

props.name: onCalendarToggled
props.description: Handler which gets executed when the calendar is opened or closed

props.name: renderKnob
props.description: Replace default agenda's knob with a custom one

props.name: showClosingKnob
props.description: Whether the knob should always be visible (when hideKnob = false)

props.name: showOnlySelectedDayItems
props.description: Whether to show items only for the selected date

props.name: renderEmptyData
props.description: Replace default ActivityIndicator with a custom one
